title: Computer Vision - Post-Unit Survey for Teachers

elements.name: survey_preamble_header_and_text
elements.html:
Welcome to Code.org's Computer Vision - Post-Unit Survey

Code.org relies on surveys as a crucial tool to remain connected to teachers, and to give you the opportunity to provide feedback about your experience teaching our curriculum.

The purpose of this survey is to understand better who our teachers are, their motivation to teach Code.org's Computer Vision unit, and their previous experience with this content and tools. 

Privacy and Confidentiality

  • Your individual responses here are completely confidential.
  • Your identity will never be revealed publicly or used to tie any responses back to you personally.
  • We may share de-identified, aggregate data (representing all responses) publicly.
  • Your de-identified responses will be used by Code.org to improve our curriculum and programs.

This survey should take less than 5 minutes to complete.  Your complete honesty and candor are appreciated.

elements.name: curriculum_perceptions
elements.html:
Your Perceptions About the Computer Vision Unit

Please share with us a little bit about your thoughts on Code.org's Computer Vision curriculum.

elements.name: student_outcomes
elements.title: After completing this module, what percentage of students were able to:

rows.text: Identify and apply computer vision technologies to solve practical problems
Analyze and manipulate datasets for training computer vision models
Develop and prototype computer vision applications using design thinking methodologies
Critically assess the ethical implications of computer vision projects
Integrate user feedback effectively into the development process
Communicate complex technical concepts related to computer vision in both written and oral forms
Collaborate with peers in a project-based environment

elements.name: module_effective
elements.title: Was teaching with Code.org's Computer Vision unit effective for your students to learn computer vision and AI concepts?

elements.name: confidence_teaching
elements.title: How confident did you feel in your ability to teach computer vision concepts by the end of the unit?

elements.name: nps_value
elements.title: How likely are you to recommend this unit to other teachers?

elements.name: additional_supports
elements.title: Based on your experience, what improvements would you suggest for the Computer Vision unit?

choices.text: More comprehensive lesson plans or guides.
Enhanced support for students struggling with the content.

elements.title: Please describe what other supports or resources would be helpful for teaching this unit?
